sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { StyleSheet, Text, View ,TextInput, ScrollView} from 'react-native'
import Wrapper from '../../component/Wrapper/index'
import LogoName from "../../component/LogoName/index"
import Button from "../../component/Button/index"
import { version } from 'react/cjs/react.development'

const index = () => {
    return (
        <>
        <LogoName />
        
        <View style={styles.container}>
           
            <Text style={{fontSize:23,fontWeight:"bold",color:"#430064" ,textAlign:"center",marginBottom:5}}>SIGN UP</Text>
            <ScrollView showsVerticalScrollIndicator={false}>
            <BoxDetails  heading="Enter Name" plhoder="enter you name"/>
            <BoxDetails  heading="Enter Email" plhoder="altafhussain@gmail.com"/>
            <BoxDetails  heading="Enter Mobile" plhoder="+92 3493480304"/>
            <BoxDetails ps={true}  heading="Enter Password" plhoder="enter you name"/>
            <BoxDetails  ps={true} heading="Conform Password" plhoder="enter you name"/>

            
            <Button name="Next"/>
            </ScrollView>
        </View>
        
        
        </>
    )
}

const BoxDetails=({heading,plhoder,ps})=>{
    console.log(plhoder,heading)
    return(
        <View >
            <View style={styles.box}>
                <Text style={{fontWeight:"bold",fontSize:15}}>{heading}</Text>
                <TextInput secureTextEntry={ps} style={{fontSize:15}} placeholder={plhoder} />
            </View>
            </View>
    )
}

export default index

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
    container:{
        padding:40,
        backgroundColor:"yellow",
        // alignItems:"center",
        backgroundColor:"white",
        width:"100%",
        height:"80%",
        borderTopLeftRadius:30,
        borderTopRightRadius:30,
 
        
        
    },
    box:{
        borderRadius:7,
        borderColor:"gray",
        borderWidth:1,
        padding:9,
        margin:6,
        backgroundColor:"#FFFEFF"
        
        
        
    }
})
